input.sentences: in catering school we learned all about the importance of fresh ingredients .
when we were n't learning the fundamentals such as risotto . . .
we were learning how to create our own dishes .
my partner came up with the great stew !
while i enjoyed everything i learned | my favorite part was making desserts .
output.sentences: I learned what ingredients make up this dish while I was in school.
Part-time courses helped me learn the fundamentals of risotto.
I am learning to create new dishes.
I prepared a stew with a partner
It was our favorite dish learned so far and we enjoyed it.
